name.ja: Google Apps Script コパイロット

short.ar: امتداد ذكاء اصطناعي يساعدك في كتابة كود Google Apps Script.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: An AI Extension that will help you write google apps script code.
short.de: Eine KI-Erweiterung, die Ihnen beim Schreiben von Google Apps Script-Code hilft.
short.es: Una extensión de IA que te ayudará a escribir código de Google Apps Script.
short.fr: Une extension d'IA qui vous aidera à écrire du code Google Apps Script.
short.it: Un'estensione IA che ti aiuterà a scrivere codice Google Apps Script.
short.ja: Google Apps Script のコードを書くのを手助けする AI 拡張機能です。
short.ru: Расширение ИИ, которое поможет вам писать код Google Apps Script.
short.zh_CN: 一个帮助你编写Google应用脚本代码的AI扩展。

long.ar,de,es,fr,it,ja,ru,zh_CN:
This Extension will help you write and explain Google Apps Script Code using AI.

Features:
- Realtime Chat with AI directly inside your Apps Script IDE
- Spotlight Feature (Ctrl + 0) that let's you instantly generate and directly insert the code to the 
  Apps Script IDE
- Access to Chat History
- RAG added to Realtime Chat
- Comment Questions Based Inline Suggestion
- Code AutoComplete
- More Features Coming Soon...

Changelogs:
v1.0.1
Extension is totally updated

v1.0.2
Minor Bugs Fixes

v1.0.3
Chat History Feature Added, UI updated and chat and spotlight icons not appearing on load (fixed)

v1.0.4
Token expiry issue fixed

v1.0.5
Retrieval augmented generation (RAG) added to Realtime Chat.

v1.0.8
Spotlight UI Updated and chat history bug fixed.

v1.0.9
Comment Question Based Inline Suggestions

v1.1.0
Code AutoComplete

This Extension is not affiliated with or endorsed or sponsored by Google.
